basic_info.summary: Software Engineer with 4 years of experience in developing and maintaining software applications. Proficient in various programming languages including Python, Java and JavaScript. Strong experience with Agile development methodologies and a proven track record of delivering high-quality software on time and within budget. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.

projects.title: Financial Spreading Automation
details: Implemented algorithm to extract 400 relevant fields from documents of up to 300 pages
Devised a machine learning model to classify extracted fields into over 20 classes and 40 subclasses using data from1000 documents and 400000 data points with an accuracy of 98.47%
Rebuilt the user queuing module that resulted in an increase of 33% in eﬃciency
Tested the application and performed root cause analysis reducing the error rate by 27%

projects.title: Financial Process Automation Assessment
details: Analysed 17 processes and identified automation opportunities for 9 with potential increase of 60% eﬃciency with 10% cost reductions

projects.title: Clinical Trial adverse event reporting Automation
details: Upgraded the manual entry of adverse eﬀect form data into the database by using OCR tools and Intelligent Document processing platforms reducing the turnaround time by 75%
Computed machine learning model to predict adverse eﬀect with a test accuracy of 95%

projects.title: Human Resource support Automation
details: Examined client owned proprietary framework for chatbots and mastered it withing 54 hours
Implemented Bot using said framework reducing, escalations by 45%

projects.title: IT support Automation
details: Built chatbot to automate IT support queries and operations increasing overall eﬃciency by 40%
Integrated chatbot into SharePoint website for easy access for over 4000 employees

projects.title: Customer Service Automation
details: Developed chat bot for leading Australian energy company increasing customer engagement by 80% and potential reduction of 20% in costs

projects.title: Containerized Sentiment Analysis
description: Built and containerized a webserver to perform sentiment analysis using REST APIs

projects.title: Twitter Customer Engagement Analysis using NLP
description: Analyse the impact of the tokens in a brand's tweets on the number of retweets.

projects.title: Music Records Database Design
description: Designed a database to store information about various entities and their relationships in a music record scenario. Implemented the database in SQL Server along with 3 Triggers and 3 Procedures and Couchbase.
Implemented the database in both SQL Server along with 3 Triggers & 3 Procedures and NoSQL database, Couchbase.

projects.title: Sensor Data Analysis
description: Implemented data visualization tools to visualize trends and relations between data from 6 sensors to understand failure conditions.
